biography: The Atlanta Film Society is one of the largest organizations dedicated to the promotion and education of film in the Southeastern United States. Enriching the community through screenings, classes, workshops and other events year-round, including the Atlanta Film Society’s flagship program, the Atlanta Film Festival. An Academy Award-qualifying event, the Atlanta Film Festival annually showcases over 200 films along with a full Creative Conference focusing on various filmmaking topics to nearly 30,000 attendees across an eleven day event each spring. The Atlanta Film Festival has been named one of the “25 Coolest Film Festival in the World” and one of “50 Film Festivals Worth the Entry Fee” by MovieMaker Magazine.
